price: ته (هم) زموږ په شان له يو بشر پرته بل څه نه يې، نو كه رښتينى يې څه نښانه خو راوړه!
arabic: مَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا فَأۡتِ بِـَٔايَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: mā anta illā basharun mith'lunā fati biāyatin in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
